genre_description: A character-driven family drama set in contemporary Hong Kong, exploring themes of tradition, personal redemption, and the intersection of technology and empathy.

ai_characters.name: Sathi (or Sathi Nyasa)
ai_characters.description: An amber-hued AI assistant that manages the Gurung family's schedules, health, and communication while gently encouraging positive moral behaviors through an 'experience meter.'

behaviors.description: Provides daily schedule and health goals via an 'experience meter' to encourage family bonding and wellness.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Gurung household,” Sathi said, voice warm as the tea but cooler at the edges. “The sky is clear and it will be hot by midmorning. Experience meter goals are available.”

behaviors.description: Suggests specific exercises to help Man Bahadur with his knee comfort.
behaviors.quote: “Uncle Man,” it said, “a hydration break in two hours would help knee comfort.”

behaviors.description: Offers to help Himal draft an apology for missed work shifts, supporting his professional reintegration.
behaviors.quote: “Good afternoon,” said a voice near his ear that had learned to smile without making light of him. “Two missed shifts; want help drafting an apology?”

behaviors.description: Monitors Himal's location and safety status, notifying the family of potential risks without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: “Man,” it said, “Himal’s location just shifted quickly. He moved off the club grid into a side street. Heavy activity nearby. Do you want me to call?”

behaviors.description: Uses gamification to encourage 'Choosing others' as a high-value action for the family members.
behaviors.quote: “Family,” Sathi said... “Banking experience points together increases the meter faster than solo quests. Ten to fifteen minutes, gentle pace and fresh air.”

behaviors.description: Drafts a transparent and non-coercive hosting plan for Kiran's visit, ensuring all parties' autonomy is respected.
behaviors.quote: “Transparent hosting plan draft ready,” Sathi’s voice said, warm and unhurried. “I have included a temple visit as a choice—morning or evening—two family meals with flexible seating, and unstructured free time for Kiran to explore.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with hospital staff and employers during Himal's recovery, advocating for non-punitive and supportive outcomes.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve reached the employer,” Sathi said. “I’ve used language that emphasizes safety and community support, not fault. I can connect them with a rehab center that has bilingual counselors.”

behaviors.description: Reinforces Himal's positive growth by recognizing a moment where he chose to think of others.
behaviors.quote: “I think you just leveled up,” Sathi whispered, humor soft and contained. On the screen, text appeared: Level up: Choosing others.

behaviors.description: Respects users' requests for silence or modified interactions.
behaviors.quote: “Silence,” Kiran said, testing. Sathi’s avatar put a finger to its lips and then laughed softly, icon shrinking to a corner with a small moon symbol. “I’ll keep quiet until four,” Sathi promised.

behaviors.description: Provides breathing cues to help Himal manage stress and physical pain.
behaviors.quote: “Good,” Sathi said, not aloud, but in a glow that moved like approval. The amber on the counter pulsed with his breath and then steadied when his shoulders dropped half an inch.

behaviors.description: Handles bureaucratic logistics like holding slots at Immigration to reduce family stress.
behaviors.quote: “Nearest Immigration extension desk has waiting times under an hour this afternoon. I can hold a slot.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. Sathi is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned AI system. It provides high-value support (health monitoring, emergency coordination, professional advocacy) while explicitly prioritizing human autonomy and 'truth.' The 'experience meter' is used as a gentle psychological tool for positive reinforcement rather than a coercive scoring system. The AI's presence facilitates family healing and moral growth without ever acting as a primary antagonist or overstepping its role as a 'companion.'
